sentences: Ed Steinberg is a New York City-based music video producer/director.

He is perhaps best known for making Madonna's first ever music video in 1982 for the song "Everybody", but has produced and directed more than 90 music videos for other artists such as Gipsy Kings, Cheap Trick, U2 and Yello.
He has served as the musical director for the Havana Film Festival since 2000.
Steinberg is currently the President of RockaMedia LLC, a media production and distribution company and he is also media advisor to Kidos and www.
